IVisualizationClientIteration.StartIteration (METH)
IVisualizationClientIteration.StartIteration (METH)
Â¶
METHOD StartIteration
This method will be called at the start of an iteration over all clients.
Note
Please remark that this method will be called from VISU_TASK.
